concepts.name: Monsters That Look Suspiciously Like Genitalia

results.deck: Spore is about the creation and evolution of creatures in various stages of development.  EA is counting on Spore to be massively popular and spawn many expansion packs, sequels, and spin-offs.
results.description: Spore is a franchise of games by Will Wright based on the concept creating and evolving your creature, loosely based on science.
results.name: Spore
